author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam visits the archives at Paramount Pictures, where he and Joey get to examine and learn about the history of VistaVision film cameras. Charlotte Barker, Paramount's Director of Film Restoration and Preservation, shows us examples of this groundbreaking widescreen format and the inventive ways that VistaVision made use of 35mm film. 

Tested Team Youtube Channel @TestedTeam  ASC Video Series:
The History of Hollywood Film Cameras and Cinematography: https://youtu.be/SPOLxZfVB-o
The History of Hollywood's Large Format Film Cameras!: https://youtu.be/uRg_qjXMZjE

Watch Charlotte Barkers Film Industry Youtube Show:
https://www.youtube.com/@PerfDamagePodcast

Shot and edited by Joey Fameli
Music by Jinglepunks
Additional media courtesy Paramount Pictures Archives

title: Adam Savage Learns About VistaVision Filming Cameras at Paramount!
